312.<voice 01148_00000312><start_lip_sync n0:

317.<voice 01555_00000317><start_lip_sync n0:

318.<voice 01645_00000318><start_lip_sync n0:

319.<voice 01724_00000319><start_lip_sync n0:

321.<voice 02233_00000321><start_lip_sync n0:

322.<voice 02342_00000322><start_lip_sync n0:

<voice 00615_00000468><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>雖然芙拉的發言讓我捏了一把冷汗，

470.<voice 00773_00000470><start_lip_sync n0:

472.<voice 00878_00000472><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00878_00000472><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>綠之鑰徽就送給你吧。<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

474.<voice 01093_00000474><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01093_00000474><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>不過，原來有人為了阻止乘風使獲得風之衣，

475.<voice 01138_00000475><start_lip_sync n0:

19001544.<voice 01382_00000481><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01382_00000481><start_lip_sync n00254 _normal m00001>我要努力做一名優秀的乘風使。

19000691.<voice 01413_19000691><start_lip_sync n0:

19000693.<voice 01492_19000693><start_lip_sync n0:

130567.<voice 00051_00130567><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00051_00130567><start_lip_sync n00262 _normal m00001>我是劍士坤札。

130568.<voice 00190_00130568><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00190_00130568><start_lip_sync n00262 _normal m00001>不過，這裡的人們都很奇怪。

130569.<voice 00289_00130569><start_lip_sync n0:

130570.<voice 00590_00130570><start_lip_sync n0:
